title: How to Get the Buddha Fruit: Awakening, Movesets, & More

steps.title: The Buddha Fruit isn't as expensive as other powerful fruits.
steps.content: The Buddha Fruit isn't as expensive as other powerful fruits. The Buddha Fruit is a Legendary Beast-type Blox Fruit. You can purchase it for $1,200,000 or 1,650 Robux from the Blox Fruit Dealer. [1] X Research source

steps.title: The Buddha Fruit is a great fruit for many things.
steps.content: The Buddha Fruit is a great fruit for many things. It works well for raids, PvP, and grinding. Since you can use your fighting styles, guns, and swords, it's a great fruit for players working on grinding those types of combat. However, this means many users don't actually utilize Buddha's moves, which makes them easy targets for sky campers.

steps.title: Awakening Buddha V2 takes 14,500 Fragments.
steps.content: Awakening Buddha V2 takes 14,500 Fragments. Fragments can be obtained in several ways, but you'll most likely get them from finishing raids or defeating Sea Beasts. When awakening Buddha, awaken your moves in this order: Z (Shift), F (Heavenly Impact), X (Light of Annihilation), C (Twilight of the Gods), V (Retribution Dash) Once you awaken at least one Buddha Fruit move, you'll get the "Colossal God" title (title #039).

steps.title: Transform (Z)
steps.content: Transform ( Z ) Mastery cost: 1 Mastery Damage: n/a Description: You turn into a giant Buddha with a gold aura. This transformation gives you a big damage reduction buff and increases your reach to five times that of a normal player. Note: You must use this move first before you can use any other Buddha moves.

steps.title: Impact (X)
steps.content: Impact ( X ) Mastery cost: 1 Mastery Damage: 3044 Description: You create a ball of light, then touch it to the ground to create a huge explosion. This blast knocks back enemies and does a lot of damage, but the charging time leaves you vulnerable.

steps.title: Buddha Leap (C)
steps.content: Buddha Leap ( C ) Mastery cost: 100 Mastery Damage: 3402 Description: You leap into the air and land wherever the cursor is placed. When you land, a shock wave radiates from you, damaging enemies it hits.

steps.title: Buddha Explosion (V)
steps.content: Buddha Explosion ( V ) Mastery cost: 200 Mastery Damage: 4655 Description: You charge for half of a second, then create a massive explosion around your body. This does a lot of damage to nearby enemies and knocks them back.

steps.title: Shift (Z)
steps.content: Shift ( Z ) Mastery cost: 1 Mastery Fragments cost: 500 Fragments Damage: 3581 Cooldown: 3 seconds Description: You turn into a giant golden Buddha surrounded by golden effects. When you shift, lightning strikes all nearby enemies to deal damage.

steps.title: Heavenly Impact (X)
steps.content: Heavenly Impact ( X ) Mastery cost: 1 Mastery Fragments cost: 3,000 Fragments Damage: 3760 Cooldown: 9 seconds Description: You slam the ground with your fist. This causes an explosion which does damage and breaks instinct.

steps.title: Light of Annihilation (C)
steps.content: Light of Annihilation ( C ) Mastery cost: 100 Mastery Fragments cost: 4,000 Fragments Damage: 7412 Cooldown: 13.5 seconds Description: You gather energy, then shoot a massive beam out of your mouth. You also create an explosion. This move will break instinct.

steps.title: Twilight of the Gods (V)
steps.content: Twilight of the Gods ( V ) Mastery cost: 200 Mastery Fragments cost: 5,000 Fragments Damage: 5526-9131 Cooldown: 21 seconds Description: You rise into the air and start shooting a continuous beam of light. This light will explode when it touches something, and the explosion will create a pillar of light. Any enemy caught in the pillar is stunned and has instinct broken.

steps.title: Retribution Dash (F)
steps.content: Retribution Dash ( F ) Mastery cost: 0 Mastery Fragments cost: 2,000 Fragments Damage: 3133 Cooldown: 15 seconds Description: You dash forward, leaving a trail of light behind you. If you hit an enemy while dashing, you will pick them up and slam them into the ground.

steps.title: Divine Aura
steps.content: Divine Aura Before awakening, you get a big damage reduction buff when transformed. You also have five times the reach of a normal player. After awakening, your damage reduction buff is increased a little bit, and you now have eight times the reach of a normal player. You also get the water-walking ability passively (because your hitbox is above the water).

steps.title: Seismic Jump (V2 only)
steps.content: Seismic Jump (V2 only) After awakening, you create a small shock wave whenever you are transformed and you jump. This shock wave does a little damage and breaks instinct. You also have increased jump height.

steps.title: Pros
steps.content: Pros Relatively easy to obtain Almost all moves break instinct Does a good amount of damage Is as valuable as a Mythical fruit in trading Allows you to use fighting styles, swords, and guns when transformed Good mobility with jump buffs

steps.title: Cons
steps.content: Cons Not the best for combos Can be easily countered by Ice Fruit You must transform in order to use your moves Transforming increases your hitbox, which makes you easier to hit It's possible to glitch into the ground when using Shift (V2 transform) Some awakened moves are difficult to land hits with
